t: Vehicle Fleet Management - AWS IoT FleetWise - AWS

t: What is AWS IoT FleetWise? - AWS IoT FleetWise
s: AWS IoT FleetWise is a managed service that you can use to collect vehicle data and organize it in the cloud. You can use the collected data to improve vehicle quality, performance, and autonomy. With AWS IoT FleetWise, you can collect and organize data from vehicles that use different protocols ...

t: Connect Vehicle Data | AWS IoT FleetWise Pricing | Amazon Web Services
s: AWS IoT FleetWise allows you to collect, transform, and transfer vehicle data to the cloud in near real time. You pay for two dimensions when using AWS IoT FleetWise: by number of vehicles and by number of messages. You are charged according to a 3-tiered cost structure, based on the volume ...

t: AWS IoT FleetWise Now Generally Available - InfoQ

t: Announcing AWS IoT FleetWise (Preview), a new service for transferring vehicle data to the cloud more efficiently
s: AWS IoT FleetWise can access the unique data format of a vehicle then structure and standardize the data so automakers don’t have to build custom data collection systems. Automakers start in the AWS Management Console by defining and modeling vehicle attributes (e.g.

t: Connected Vehicle Data – AWS IoT FleetWise Customers – Amazon Web Services
s: Discover how AWS IoT FleetWise customers will collect, transform, and transfer vehicle data to the cloud and use that data to improve vehicle quality, safety, and autonomy.

t: Connected Vehicle Data – AWS IoT FleetWise FAQs – Amazon Web Services
s: AWS IoT FleetWise removes the complexities of collecting data from vehicle fleets at scale. Using virtual vehicle modeling, you can create a common data format across vehicle brands, models, and components, allowing for streamlined fleet-wide data analysis in the cloud.

t: Set up AWS IoT FleetWise - AWS IoT FleetWise
s: You can use a service-linked role with AWS IoT FleetWise. Service-linked roles are predefined by AWS IoT FleetWise and include the permissions that AWS IoT FleetWise needs to send metrics to Amazon CloudWatch.
